name: Slate
text:
Anne Levy, a child Holocaust survivor, had been following David Duke’s rise to power with increasing horror. One day, at a Holocaust exhibit, she saw him in person. Their confrontation made headlines. 

Levy recounts the moment on episode 3 of #SlowBurn4: https://t.co/1EYtVJcdxa https://t.co/wrn0THEBou
